description: Crisp morning is Joey's favorite time to run.  The streets of San Francisco have just started bustling and Joey enjoys rising with the City.  Today, he's running his favorite course: through Chinatown, down across the park, and right past the trolley turn-around. His focus soon moves to tugging that swollen meat.  Watch his hands explore his whole body as he decompresses.  As Joey loses himself deeper into a realm of sexual self-therapy, he kicks one leg up on an ottoman to have better access to his tight hole.  He rubs the sensitive area while continuing to jerk his erection.   Hang out with Joey and enjoy this very HOT cool down as the two of you build to an explosively satisfying finish.
title: Joey Rico
